Hello everyone,=A0

I hope you won't mind this shameless plug, but my partn=
er Eeni has embarked on an ambitious project to make an English-language do=
ujinshi out of a Rurouni Kenshin fanfiction I wrote. We have set up a tumbl=
r blog in order to showcase our work, and we would be extremely grateful fo=
r any help we can get in promoting it. If you could possibly check it out, =
and if you like it, give us a shout-out on your website, we'd be thrilled. =
We really hope you enjoy it and can spread the love - it was a lot of work,=
 if I may say so myself. Eeni spent weeks working on the first two chapters=
.=A0

The fic itself is "The Courtship of Lady Tokio". The links are here:=
=A0

Tumblr:=A0http://meijikeikanromantan.tumblr.com=A0
Doujinshi:=A0http:/=
/meijikeikanromantan.tumblr.com/tagged/CLT-doujinshi=A0

www.fanfiction.net/s/8593839/1/Meiji-Keikan-Romantan=A0
http://meijikeikanr=
omantan.tumblr.com/tagged/Meiji-Keikan-Romantan=A0

Please let us know what=
 you think - your candid opinion would be very much appreciated!=A0

Thank =
you so much in advance,=A0

M & Eeni=A0
